items.badge_name: Cheers to Independent U.S. Craft Breweries (Level 11)
items.badge_description: Cheers, beer patriot! You are supporting the small and independent American craft brewer. When you see the seal -- shaped like an upside-down beer bottle -- that's independence you're tasting. Try 5 more to earn Level 12!

Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 50 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more for Level 11!

Round and round the wheel goes! Which style you’ll be drinking, nobody knows! Your desire to explore different styles is inspiring. Keep it up! That's a check-in to at least 45 different styles. Try 5 more for Level 10!

Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 10 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 3!
We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 5 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 2

Porters and Stouts are rich with both history and flavor. Roasty, dark, and delicious, these two styles helped start it all. That’s 5 different beers with the style of Porter or Stout. Try 5 more to unlock Level 2.

You’ve pledged allegiance, and now it’s time to enjoy some beer! Now remember, not all American beer is fizzy and yellow. That’s 85 different beers from a brewery in the United States. Try 5 more for Level 18.
It's New Brew Thursday! Drink a new beer on three Thursdays in a 30 day period! Find out how New Brew Thursday was started, and catch up on old episodes.

items.checkin_comment: Tasty, I can see why it won the 2018 MD comptroller's cup

items.badge_name: Cheers to Independent U.S. Craft Breweries (Level 10)
items.badge_description: Cheers, beer patriot! You are supporting the small and independent American craft brewer. When you see the seal -- shaped like an upside-down beer bottle -- that's independence you're tasting. Try 5 more to earn Level 11!

Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 40 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 9!
Light and crisp, a Pilsner is all you need to make your day great. Though, perhaps another one would make it even better. That’s 5 different Pilsners. Try 5 more to unlock Level 2

items.checkin_comment: First beer with spruce tip, took a little bit to get use to the flavor

items.badge_description: Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 45 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more for Level 10!

Another year down! Cheers to 2019 and all the delicious beer adventures to come! What're you looking forward to trying most?

There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 45 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 10!

items.checkin_comment: Not too hoppy. Similar bitterness to a pale ale, which I like.
